title: Family and friends remember man and daughter killed in LaPlace
content: You don't often see the sheriff or his deputies at a vigil, but the St. John Parish sheriff says it's also not often he's involved in the homicide of a four-year-old child. Cameron Mack and his little girl Cali were gunned down here, right in front of their home as they returned from the grocery store.    Start the conversation, or Read more at KPLC-TV Lake Charles.          Add your comments below                    Copyright © 2018 Topix LLC
